moves.1. d4: This was one of my best games in which I beat an 1800 rated player. Pease Comment.
moves.5... Bxc3+: smart. giving me double pawns and if he had played Ba5 b4 Bb6 c5 and i win the bishop
moves.10... Nxf6: he takes tied game so far
moves.11. c5: push my pawn so i have good pawn structure
moves.12... dxe4: he takes messing up his pawn structure a little
moves.18... f3: he wants to get his queen to g2
moves.19... Qg4: attacking my knight and hoping to play Qh3
moves.20. Nd2: this prevents him from playing Qh3 because I take the pawn
moves.22. Qxd7 Qh3: threatens mate but i can take f3 because i am up a bishop and 2 pawns
moves.28... Rh5: threatens a mate at h2. Here I thought I had lost but then i saw i could move my rook
moves.33... Qxf2 34. Qb8+: defends g3 and allows me to promote
moves.38... Rb5+: here I also thought i had lost the game and i was about to take with my queen but then I noticed my queen was defended by the pawn which would become a queen
moves.39. Ka2: He resigns. Thank you for watching please comment on possible better moves and what you thought about the game
